alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 06 at 5:58PM EDT until April 06 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Jefferson County in Big Bend of Florida... Northeastern Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... Southeastern Thomas County in south central Georgia... Southwestern Brooks County in south central Georgia... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 558 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Monticello, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Monticello, Alma, Fincher, Dills, Grooverville, Festus, Lois, Everett, Miccosukee, Casa Blanco, Jarrott, Montivilla, Ashville and Lake Miccosukee. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for south central Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for south central Georgia.
